scripts.dev: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.development.local next dev
scripts.dev:test: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.test.local next dev
scripts.dev:uat: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.uat.local next dev
scripts.dev:prod: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.production.local next dev
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.development next build
scripts.build:test: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.test next build
scripts.build:uat: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.uat next build
scripts.build:prod: npm run clear && env-cmd -f .env.production next build
scripts.serve: npm run build:prod && npm run start
scripts.serve:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run start
scripts.serve:test: npm run build:test && npm run start
scripts.serve:uat: npm run build:uat && npm run start
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run start
